commentText:
Utilities methods for manipulating dates in iso8601 format. This is much much faster and GC friendly than using SimpleDateFormat so highly suitable if you (un)serialize lots of date objects.

Supported parse format: [yyyy-MM-dd|yyyyMMdd][T(hh:mm[:ss[.sss]]|hhmm[ss[.sss]])]?[Z|[+-]hh[:]mm]]

name: ISO8601Utils

methods.commentText:
Parses a date from ISO-8601 formatted string. It expects a format
 [yyyy-MM-dd|yyyyMMdd][T(hh:mm[:ss[.sss]]|hhmm[ss[.sss]])]?[Z|[+-]hh:mm]]

tags.name: @param
tags.text: date ISO string to parse in the appropriate format.

inlineTags.text: ISO string to parse in the appropriate format.

tags.name: @param
tags.text: pos The position to start parsing from, updated to where parsing stopped.
